test_helpers module

test_helpers.test_download_ai_img(mock_openai_image_create)[source]

Mock helpers.openai.Image.create() to return base64 data and assert that download_ai_img() returns True.

test_helpers.test_fail_download_ai_img(mock_openai_image_create)[source]

Mock helpers.openai.Image.create() to raise an AuthenticationError. Assert that the program exits via sys.exit() and displays that the api key is not set

test_helpers.test_fail_get_random_movie_title(mock_requests_get)[source]

Mock response.raise_for_status() to raise a RequestException and set response.status code to 401 and then 403. Assert that the program exits via sys.exit() and displays that the api key is not set.

test_helpers.test_fail_guess_string(mock_input)[source]

Mock input() to simulate a wrong movie title guess and assert False return value from guess_string().

test_helpers.test_fail_mask_string()[source]
test_helpers.test_get_random_movie_title(mock_requests_get)[source]

Mock requests.get() to return “Back to the Future” and assert the same title is returned by get_random_movie_title().

test_helpers.test_guess_string(mock_input)[source]

Mock input() to simulate a correct movie title guess and assert True return value from guess_string().

test_helpers.test_mask_string()[source]
